restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.description: Places that serve full meals. Perfect for lunch and dinner. Some may only open at night.

nightlife.title: Nightlife
nightlife.description: Bars, pubs, karaoke spots, clubs, or anything focused on drinks and entertainment.

map.title: Invalid Map Link {{mapsI}}
map.content:
The provided map link is not valid. Make sure the link starts with "http://" or "https://" and that it is from one of the following platforms:

{{googleMapsI}} Google Maps
{{appleMapsI}} Apple Maps

instagram.content: The provided link is not valid. Make sure it starts with "https://www.instagram.com"

media.title: Invalid Link {{linkI}}

twitter_image.title: Invalid Twitter Image {{twitterI}}
twitter_image.content:
The system does not support images coming from Twitter (a.k.a. {{xI}} if you‚Äôre a picky person).

Please use another external source for your images.
